headline: David Kline to Depart as Chief Technology Officer of News Corp
summary: NEW YORK, March 25, 2025--News Corp (NASDAQ: NWS, NWSA; ASX: NWS; NWSLV) announced today that David Kline, the company’s Chief Technology Officer, will resign from his role to accept a position outside the organization. He will remain with News Corp through June 30, 2025, and a search is beginning for his successor.
